Detailed Description

Structure to hold a set of euler angles in the format XYZ.

Todo:
Expand to accommodate any set of euler angles (eg. XYX, ZXY, ...)
Euler angles represent series of rotations in 3D, applied in a defined order
Warning:
Euler angles are prone to Gimbel Lock.
